for: collaborative user-defined program and architecture characterization, multi-objective optimization (execution time, code size, compilation time, power consumption) and co-design of computer systems using public repositories of knowledge, plugin-based auto-tuning, machine learning and crowdsourcing

title: cTuning and CCC (Continuous Collective Compilation) frameworks
